name: Ambush
text: Each opponent removes 1 ORANGE from their TAVERN and returns it to the supply.  For each opponent that could not do so, take 1 ORANGE from the supply and place it in your TAVERN

name: Ambush
text: Each opponent removes 1 ORANGE from their TAVERN and returns it to the supply.  For each opponent that could not do so, take 1 ORANGE from the supply and place it in your TAVERN

name: Arcane Mishap
text: Each opponent removes 1 PURPLE from their TAVERN and returns it to the supply.  For each opponent that could not do so, draw 1 INTRIGUE.

name: Arcane Mishap
text: Each opponent removes 1 PURPLE from their TAVERN and returns it to the supply.  For each opponent that could not do so, draw 1 INTRIGUE.

name: Assassination
text: Each opponent removes 1 BLACK from their TAVERN and returns it to the supply.  For each opponent that could not do so, take 2 COINS from the supply and place it in your TAVERN

name: Assassination
text: Each opponent removes 1 BLACK from their TAVERN and returns it to the supply.  For each opponent that could not do so, take 2 COINS from the supply and place it in your TAVERN

name: Bribe Agent
text: Pay 2 COINS.  Choose an action space containing an opponent's AGENT.  You use theat space's action as though you had assigned an AGENT to it.

name: Bribe Agent
text: Pay 2 COINS.  Choose an action space containing an opponent's AGENT.  You use theat space's action as though you had assigned an AGENT to it.

name: Free Drinks
text: Remove 1 ANY from an opponent's TAVERN, and hten place it in your TAVERN

name: Free Drinks
text: Remove 1 ANY from an opponent's TAVERN, and hten place it in your TAVERN

name: Lack of Faith
text: Each opponent removes 1 WHITE from their TAVERN and returns it to the supply.  For each opponent that could not do so, you score 2VPS.

name: Lack of Faith
text: Each opponent removes 1 WHITE from their TAVERN and returns it to the supply.  For each opponent that could not do so, you score 2VPS.

name: Accelerate Plans
text: Choose 1 of your AGENTS assigned to Waterdeep Harbor. Return it to your pool, then immediately assign 2 AGENTS

name: Bidding War
text: Draw QUESTS from the deck equal to the number of players.  Keep one and pass the remaining QUESTS to the player on your left.  Each player, in turn, chooses one QUEST to keep and passes the rest to the left until every player has taken a QUEST.

name: Bidding War
text: Draw QUESTS from the deck equal to the number of players.  Keep one and pass the remaining QUESTS to the player on your left.  Each player, in turn, chooses one QUEST to keep and passes the rest to the left until every player has taken a QUEST.

name: Bidding War
text: Draw QUESTS from the deck equal to the number of players.  Keep one and pass the remaining QUESTS to the player on your left.  Each player, in turn, chooses one QUEST to keep and passes the rest to the left until every player has taken a QUEST.

name: Call for Adventurers
text: Take 2 ANY from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Each opponent takes 1 ANY from the SUPPLY and places it in their TAVERN.

name: Call for Adventurers
text: Take 2 ANY from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Each opponent takes 1 ANY from the SUPPLY and places it in their TAVERN.

name: Call in a Favor
text: Choose one of the following to take from the SUPPLY: 4 COINS, 2 ORANGE, 2 BLACK, 1 PURPLE, 1 WHITE

name: Call in a Favor
text: Choose one of the following to take from the SUPPLY: 4 COINS, 2 ORANGE, 2 BLACK, 1 PURPLE, 1 WHITE

name: Change of Plans
text: Discard an uncompleted QUEST.  Score 6VP.  Each opponent can choose to discard an uncompleted QUEST to score 3VP. (You can discard a MANDATORY QUEST in this way.)

name: Conscription
text: Take 2 ORANGE from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 1 ORANGE from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Conscription
text: Take 2 ORANGE from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 1 ORANGE from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Crime Wave
text: Take 2 BLACK from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 1 BLACK from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Crime Wave
text: Take 2 BLACK from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 1 BLACK from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Good Faith
text: Take 2 WHITE from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 1 WHITE from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Good Faith
text: Take 2 WHITE from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 1 WHITE from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Graduation Day
text: Take 2 PURPLE from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 1 PURPLE from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Graduation Day
text: Take 2 PURPLE from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 1 PURPLE from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Real Estate Deal
text: Discard a BUILDING under your control that currently has no AGENT assigned to it.  Then choose 1 BUILDING in BUILDER's HALL and put it under your control at no cost.

name: Recall Agent
text: Return 1 of your assigned AGENTS to your pool

name: Recall Agent
text: Return 1 of your assigned AGENTS to your pool

name: Recruit Spies
text: Take 2 BLACK from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Each opponent can choose to give you 1 BLACK once to score 3VP.

name: Request Assistance
text: Take 2 ORANGE from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Each opponent can choose to give you 1 ORANGE once to score 3VP.

name: Research Agreement
text: Take 1 PURPLE from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Each opponent can choose to give you 1 PURPLE once to score 5VP.

name: Sample Wares
text: Assign 1 of your unused AGENTS to a BUILDING in BUILDER"S HALL.  You immediately use the effect of that BUILDING as though you controlled it.

name: Sample Wares
text: Assign 1 of your unused AGENTS to a BUILDING in BUILDER"S HALL.  You immediately use the effect of that BUILDING as though you controlled it.

name: Special Assignment
text: Choose a QUEST TYPE: ARCANA,COMMERCE, PIETY, SKULLDUGGERY, or WARFARE.  Draw and reveal QUESTS untill you reveal a card of the chosen type.  Keep the QUEST and discard the rest.

name: Special Assignment
text: Choose a QUEST TYPE: ARCANA,COMMERCE, PIETY, SKULLDUGGERY, or WARFARE.  Draw and reveal QUESTS untill you reveal a card of the chosen type.  Keep the QUEST and discard the rest.

name: Spread the Wealth
text: Take 4 COINS from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 2 COINS from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Spread the Wealth
text: Take 4 COINS from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Choose 1 opponent.  That opponent takes 2 COINS from the SUPPLY and place it in their TAVERN.

name: Summon the Faithful
text: Take 1 WHITE from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Each opponent can choose to give you 1 WHITE once to score 5VP.

name: Tax Collection
text: Take 4 COINS from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Each opponent can choose to give you 4 COINS once to score 4VP.

name: Tax Collection
text: Take 4 COINS from the SUPPLY and place them in your TAVERN.  Each opponent can choose to give you 4 COINS once to score 4VP.

name: Fend Off Bandits
text: Give the MANDATORY QUEST "Fend Off Bandits" to an opponent.  That opponent cannot complete any non-MANDATORY QUEST until this QUEST is completed.  Requires: 2 ORANGE, 1 PURPLE.  Rewards: 2VP

name: Foil the Zhentarim
text: Give the MANDATORY QUEST "Foil the Zhentarim" to an opponent.  That opponent cannot complete any non-MANDATORY QUEST until this QUEST is completed.  Requires: 1 BLACK, 1 ORANGE, 1 PURPLE.  Rewards: 2VP

name: Placate Angry Merchants
text: Give the MANDATORY QUEST "Placate Angry Merchants" to an opponent.  That opponent cannot complete any non-MANDATORY QUEST until this QUEST is completed.  Requires: 1 WHITE, 1 ORANGE, 1 PURPLE.  Rewards: 2VP

name: Quell Riots
text: Give the MANDATORY QUEST "Quell Riots" to an opponent.  That opponent cannot complete any non-MANDATORY QUEST until this QUEST is completed.  Requires: 2 WHITE, 1 ORANGE.  Rewards: 2VP

name: Repel Drow Invaders
text: Give the MANDATORY QUEST "Repel Drow Invaders" to an opponent.  That opponent cannot complete any non-MANDATORY QUEST until this QUEST is completed.  Requires: 1 WHITE, 1 BLACK, 1 PURPLE.  Rewards: 2VP
